message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm looking to save as much as I can on this purchase.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $87.50. I'm still a bit away from the $80 mark, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from there.
